verses.text: \w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w* laying \w aside|strong="G0659"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w malice|strong="G2549"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w guile|strong="G1388"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hypocrisies|strong="G5272"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w envies|strong="G5355"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* evil \w speakings|strong="G2636"\w*,

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w newborn|strong="G0738"\w* \w babes|strong="G1025"\w*, \w desire|strong="G1971"\w* the \w sincere|strong="G0097"\w* \w milk|strong="G1051"\w* of the \w word|strong="G3050"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w grow|strong="G0837"\w* \w thereby|strong="G1722"\w*:
If so \w be|strong="G1512"\w* ye have \w tasted|strong="G1089"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* \w gracious|strong="G5543"\w*.

\w To|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w coming|strong="G4334"\w*, \add as unto\add* a \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*, \w disallowed|strong="G0593"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1588"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add and\add* \w precious|strong="G1784"\w*,

\w Ye|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w lively|strong="G2198"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, are built \w up|strong="G3618"\w* a \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w priesthood|strong="G2406"\w*, to offer \w up|strong="G0399"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*, \w acceptable|strong="G2144"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* it is \w contained|strong="G4023"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, I \w lay|strong="G5087"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Sion|strong="G4622"\w* a chief \w corner|strong="G0204"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*, \w elect|strong="G1588"\w*, \w precious|strong="G1784"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2617"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w confounded|strong="G2617"\w*.

Unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \add he is\add* \w precious|strong="G5092"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* unto them which be \w disobedient|strong="G0544"\w*, the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w builders|strong="G3618"\w* \w disallowed|strong="G0593"\w*, the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* is \w made|strong="G1096"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of the \w corner|strong="G1137"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* of \w stumbling|strong="G4348"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w rock|strong="G4073"\w* of \w offence|strong="G4625"\w*, \add even to them\add* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* stumble \w at|strong="G4350"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, being \w disobedient|strong="G0544"\w*: \w whereunto|strong="G1519"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w appointed|strong="G5087"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add are\add* a \w chosen|strong="G1588"\w* \w generation|strong="G1085"\w*, a \w royal|strong="G0934"\w* \w priesthood|strong="G2406"\w*, an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, a \w peculiar|strong="G4047"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*; \w that|strong="G3704"\w* ye should shew \w forth|strong="G1804"\w* the \w praises|strong="G0703"\w* of him who hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w marvellous|strong="G2298"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3588"\w* in time \w past|strong="G4218"\w* \add were\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add are\add* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G1653"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* obtained \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* have obtained \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*.

Dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \add you\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w strangers|strong="G3941"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pilgrims|strong="G3927"\w*, \w abstain|strong="G0567"\w* from \w fleshly|strong="G4559"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w war|strong="G4754"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*;

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* \w honest|strong="G2570"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w whereas|strong="G1722"\w* they speak \w against|strong="G2635"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w evildoers|strong="G2555"\w*, they \w may|strong="G1392"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \add your\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, which they shall \w behold|strong="G2029"\w*, \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w visitation|strong="G1984"\w*.

Submit \w yourselves|strong="G5293"\w* to \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w ordinance|strong="G2937"\w* of \w man|strong="G0442"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Lordâ€™s sake|strong="G2962"\w*: whether it \w be|strong="G1535"\w* to the \w king|strong="G0935"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w supreme|strong="G5242"\w*;

\w Or|strong="G1535"\w* unto \w governors|strong="G2232"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto them that are \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w punishment|strong="G1557"\w* of \w evildoers|strong="G2555"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* for the \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* of them that do \w well|strong="G0017"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, that with well \w doing|strong="G0015"\w* ye may put to \w silence|strong="G5392"\w* the \w ignorance|strong="G0056"\w* of \w foolish|strong="G0878"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w using|strong="G2192"\w* \add your\add* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w* \w for|strong="G5613"\w* a \w cloke|strong="G1942"\w* of \w maliciousness|strong="G2549"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Honour|strong="G5091"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*. \w Love|strong="G0025"\w* the \w brotherhood|strong="G0081"\w*. \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w Honour|strong="G5091"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w*.

\w Servants|strong="G3610"\w*, \add be\add* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G1203"\w* \add your\add* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* to the \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gentle|strong="G1933"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w froward|strong="G4646"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* \w thankworthy|strong="G5485"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* toward \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w endure|strong="G5297"\w* \w grief|strong="G3077"\w*, \w suffering|strong="G3958"\w* \w wrongfully|strong="G0095"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w glory|strong="G2811"\w* \add is it\add*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* ye be \w buffeted|strong="G2852"\w* for your \w faults|strong="G0264"\w*, ye shall take it \w patiently|strong="G5278"\w*? \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w*, when ye do \w well|strong="G0015"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* \add for it\add*, ye take it \w patiently|strong="G5278"\w*, \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* \w acceptable|strong="G5485"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G1519"\w* \w hereunto|strong="G5124"\w* were ye \w called|strong="G2564"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w leaving|strong="G5277"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* an \w example|strong="G5261"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye should \w follow|strong="G1872"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w steps|strong="G2487"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w was|strong="G2147"\w* \w guile|strong="G1388"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w*, when he was \w reviled|strong="G3058"\w*, \w reviled|strong="G0486"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w again|strong="G0486"\w*; when he \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w*, he \w threatened|strong="G0546"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w committed|strong="G3860"\w* \add himself\add* to him that \w judgeth|strong="G2919"\w* \w righteously|strong="G1346"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* his own \w self|strong="G0846"\w* \w bare|strong="G0399"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w tree|strong="G3586"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2198"\w*, being \w dead|strong="G0581"\w* to \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, should \w live|strong="G2198"\w* unto \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*: by \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w stripes|strong="G3468"\w* ye were \w healed|strong="G2390"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w* going \w astray|strong="G4105"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w are|strong="G1994"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w returned|strong="G1994"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Shepherd|strong="G4166"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bishop|strong="G1985"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*.
